summary: This is a docket notice from the Second Circuit Court of Appeals regarding a motion for bail filed on behalf of Ghislaine Maxwell in her appeals (cases 21-770 and 21-58). The notice indicates the motion and a supporting appendix were filed electronically.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the criminal case who is appealing and for whom a motion for bail is being filed.

events.title: Motion for Bail Filed
events.description: A motion for bail is filed on behalf of Ghislaine Maxwell with the Second Circuit Court of Appeals.

keyFacts: A motion for bail was filed for Ghislaine Maxwell on May 17, 2021.
The motion was filed in the Second Circuit Court of Appeals under case numbers 21-770 and 21-58.
The filing includes a main motion and a supporting appendix document.
